title: B.S. Report - Bill Burr
description: Bill Burr joins Bill Simmons to talk about coming up in the Boston comedy scene, his journey from 'Breaking Bad' super fan to cast member, the Patriots and much more.
itunes:title: B.S. Report - Bill Burr
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Bill Burr joins Bill Simmons to talk about coming up in the Boston comedy scene, his journey from 'Breaking Bad' superfan to cast member, the Patriots' chances in the Super Bowl, and much more.
itunes:summary: Bill Burr joins Bill Simmons to talk about coming up in the Boston comedy scene, his journey from 'Breaking Bad' super fan to cast member, the Patriots and much more.
